flawed_nl_solution:
Since Jack was faster than Jill, his total running time must have been 32 - 7 = <<32-7=25>>25 seconds.
Subtracting the the time he spent running up the first half of the hill shows that it took 25 - 19 = <<25-19=5>>5 seconds to run up the second half of the hill.
#### 5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
